commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you all so much for helping me place the additional suggestion boxes.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: No problem at all! What should we do next? What do you do for student council elections at Japanese schools?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hmm... Actually, I don't quite know myself. Anyone more familiar with the process?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Now that I think about it, have we ever been involved in a student council election?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: My impression of it is that there's a candidate, and then it usually sorts itself out through some process to determine if they're credible.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That's what it was like for you as well, right, Setsuna? There wasn't any sort of independent vote or anything, was there?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I believe so. I was the only candidate up for election, so I gave my credence speech and then it was decided with a vote of confidence.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I looked it up online with Rina, and apparently, there's a lot of campaigning when there are multiple candidates. Mifune's doing that by putting up posters and stuff, right?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm curious as to what kind of campaigning she's doing.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Now is the time for Detective Kasumin to shine! I've done some research!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Um, actually, so have I.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I-I also asked everyone in the Theater Club.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Wail* But all of my hard work!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: K-Kasumi, you're always such a great help with your preemptive research!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What? Really? Yay! I've been a great help to you, right? Feel free to give me a pat on the head, okay?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Here you go!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yaaay! Wait, no! Why are you the one patting me, Shizuko?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks, Kasumi. *Pat* *Pat*

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hee hee! Okay, I'll tell you about what I found out!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: First up is the Tennis Club. She apparently recommended a member playing singles to switch to doubles.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: She said that she didn't have the skills for singles but would be useful in doubles because she has a good net game.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: There was also a Softball Club member who was delighted by all the college pamphlets Shioriko brought her to show her what schools she could go to with her skills.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I asked around at the Basketball Club, and she did something similar.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: She apparently told a starting-lineup member that she and her watchful eyes were better suited for team manager and looking after the whole team.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yeesh, I'd go nighty-night out of shock if she said something so forward like that to me.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Wouldn't the people being told to do something else be upset as well?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That's actually not the case.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: She's right! Obviously, they protest at the beginning, but then they realize it's not such a bad idea after giving her recommendation a try.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Mmhmm. Some girls have seen an improvement in their performance.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Mifune really is good at determining what people are suited or not suited to.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She apparently borrowed a book from the library to give to a member of the Theater Club to recommend breathing techniques to do before voice training.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: And she also advised the Cooking Club to collaborate with the Science Club to research seasonings.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It was apparently a good suggestion since both clubs had just barely enough club members.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: She's...quite the formidable opponent.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I hate to admit it, but she is. She seems overbearing but then apparently launches into a convincing, structured spiel about how she wants people to be.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I suppose you would be captivated if someone told you to focus on your strengths and then instilled you with their faith in your improvement and growth.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: She's a master at encouraging people.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Mifune is incredible. Her drive to act is incredible. She's looked around the whole school, researched, and spoke to the students. I've not been able to do that.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: All I've done is place suggestion boxes with all of your help.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: At this rate...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, Nico's calling.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey! What do you think you're doing, not contacting me at all?! Setsuna's re-election preparations better be progressing!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Nico, you should just admit that you called because you've been worried sick.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Q-Quiet, you!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Rin, it's not nice to butt into someone else's phone call!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Chuckle* How heartwarming.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Go on, Setsu! Have a chat with Nico-chi and the others to breathe some life back into you!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, o-okay!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Here you go.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Hello, Nico? I'm sorry for making you, Rin, and Hanayo worry about--

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I heard you gave Eli a really lousy call! You need to be more confident in yourself!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: That's Nico's way of saying that she's worried about you and to come to her if you need help!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey! Don't go putting words into my mouth!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: While you didn't explicitly say that you were worried, doesn't the fact that you brought up giving her a call mean that you were?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hush up, Hanayo!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I-I'm sorry for the concern I have caused. Um, I really am okay. And I really must win, so...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: E-Everyone! We have a delivery from Aqours!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: A huge haul of mikan oranges from Chika! It says it's a gift to show support for all of the hard work you're doing.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone's cheering for you, Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's right, that's right! Now's not the time to be disheartened!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: R-Right.
